name: Insomnia (itch) (Trident19)
description:
Insomnia is a 3D Horror - Adventure game with a story.

You have sleep problems and you wake up in the middle of the night.

Thirsty, looking for water.

But suddenly you find yourself somewhere completely different.

What is this place? Is anybody there? How do I get out?

Find your answers and face your fears!

Controls: Mouse&Keyboard

Available for: Windows

Made with: Godot Game Engine
